sources: Hawaii Rules of the Circuit Courts

caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE {CIRCUIT} CIRCUIT, STATE OF HAWAII
caption.sampleTemplate:
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE {CIRCUIT} CIRCUIT
STATE OF HAWAII

{PLAINTIFFS},

     Plaintiff(s),

v.

{DEFENDANTS},

     Defendant(s).

Civil No. {CASE_NUMBER}

{MOTION_TITLE}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State of Hawaii that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Hawaii uses circuit numbers (First, Second, Third) instead of counties in court designation
First Circuit (Oahu) handles the majority of cases
Hawaii has unique local customs that may affect filings
